overview: Anna and her mother Elena, two vampires isolated from the rest of the world, try to survive in Paris by tracking down cybercriminals at night on social networks. But, between Elenaâ€™s illness, her repeated anxiety attacks and the hunts becoming more and more dangerous; tensions rise, and the demons of the past resurface. Anna, on the brink of madness, begins to fall in her dark sides.
title: Canines
